mapper.select: SELECT a.anime_id AS animeId, a.title_english AS title, a.cover_image_url AS coverImageUrl, r.rating AS rating FROM Anime a JOIN Review r ON a.anime_id = r.anime_id WHERE a.anime_id = #{referenceAnimeId} AND r.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT at.anime_id AS animeId, t.name_eng AS tagName, at.weight AS weight FROM Animetag at JOIN Tag t ON at.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE at.anime_id = #{animeId} ORDER BY at.weight DESC
SELECT urs.user_id AS userId, urs.mode AS mode FROM Userrecommendationstate urs WHERE urs.user_id = #{userId}
